name: SkyGameChanger-AirCombat II-
detailed_description:
Shoot the missiles on the latest fighter plane, XF-98!
This game is a game that enjoys battle in the air by riding on the phenomenal endurance XF - 98.

It is suitable for this kind of players.
Since I am irritated, I want to shoot a lot of missiles anyway.
I want to drive a durable fighter aircraft.
I would like to enjoy battle in the air easily at cheap prices.

It is not suitable for this type of players.
Familiarity is necessary for maneuvering with the mouse.
(We enhanced lateral movement so that players can easily operate with keyboard)
I want to play a realistic flight shooter.
I want to enjoy a solid story.
I want to attack against the ground attack target. I want to attack against the ship.
I would like to play a game with strategy.
Graphic quality should be higher.

Story
Advances in radar technology have made stealth fighter a normal fighter plane.
Wilsword country developed the latest fighter XF-98.
It is a fighter with high attack power and phenomenal durability.
Due to the MD armor equipped with this fighter aircraft, radar performance has declined greatly.
MD armor is an armor that weakens enemy missiles by irradiating missiles with high power laser and EMP.
When the prototype was completed and trying a test flight, the Maxell federation began invading the ally Ulcafy
News coming in ...

Features of this game
A total of 4 stages.
When you shoot down all enemies the stage is over.
Many ally fighters.
More enemy fighters.
More and more missiles.

About the game
Game bugs are not confirmed with multiple test play.
Fighter aircraft appearing in this game is set with fine mobility depending on the model.
However, you will immediately shoot down, so you may not have time to worry.
When you clear the stage, STEAM achievement that it cleared the stage is activated.
The enemy may run away at the end of the stage, you need to find him and shoot down.

Control
C: Change camera
Mouse: Ascending, descending, turning
Right mouse click: Change weapon
Left mouse click: Shoot weapon
W: Speed ​​up
S: Speed down
A, D: Move the aircraft to the left and right

This game is fiction. It has nothing to do with any real country or organization.
The type of country and aircraft varies depending on the game.

short_description: When you get irritated, get on the latest fighter XF - 98 and shoot a lot of missiles! This game is a game that enjoys battle in the air by riding on the phenomenal endurance XF - 98.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: CPU：Intel core i3 7th or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1050 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: CPU：Intel core i7 7th or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1070 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
